name: Polish Reuben Casserole
author: HOUSEWIFEEXTRAORDINAIR
summary: Easy and delicious casserole, using Polish sausage.
ingredients: 2 (10.75 ounce) cans  condensed cream of mushroom soup
2 (16 ounce) cans sauerkraut, rinsed and squeezed dry
1 ½ pounds kielbasa (Polish) sausage, cut into 1/2 inch pieces
¾ cup whole wheat bread crumbs
directions: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
In a medium bowl combine the soup, milk, onion and mustard
Spread sauerkraut into the bottom of a lightly greased 9x13 inch baking dish
Top with uncooked noodles, then spoon soup mixture evenly over noodles
Cover all with sausage and top with cheese
Lastly, combine bread crumbs and melted butter in a small bowl and mix together; sprinkle mixture over cheese
Cover baking dish tightly with aluminum foil and bake in the preheated oven for 1 hour, or until noodles are tender
